attributes.action: Legalise usage/sales of marijuana and cannabis generating more income via tax.
attributes.additional_details: The additional revenue generated for the country in tax. Be it VAT or income tax derived from the amount of jobs the new industry will create just as we need it the most can only be a positive move. Research the risk/reward based on Canadas statistics.
attributes.background: Adopt the predominant American and Canadian policy where they have legalised the usage and sale of THC products including marijuana in its herbal form. It will generate massive amounts of revenue for the country just when we could do with the extra money as an added benefit.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300475
